thread.title: Samsung video leak shows the Galaxy S8 in all of its glory
thread.title_full: Samsung video leak shows the Galaxy S8 in all of its glory

title: Samsung video leak shows the Galaxy S8 in all of its glory
text:
38 shares 
Samsung might finally have a release date for the much-anticipated Galaxy S8, but the leaks keep rolling in. 
Dedicated leak portal Slashleaks has obtained footage that gives us a close look at Samsungâ€™s upcoming flagship handset. The video comes from a Weibo user and appears to show both the standard S8 as well as the bigger-sized S8+ device.
